name: Overrun (Swagonite, I Would Like To Rage, Evilhamsta, RedSkinnedDevil)
name_original: Overrun (Swagonite, I Would Like To Rage, Evilhamsta, RedSkinnedDevil)
description:
Players are given control of a spider mech in an earthy tube covered in hanging tree roots and littered with rocks and veins of ore, chasing down into the depths of the earth to eradicate swarms of alien bugs trying to reach the surface of the planet. The bugs rush towards the player, while firing corrosive bolts of plasma, who earns up points for each bug eliminated building a high score while preventing enemies reaching the surface and protecting their mech from enemy fire. When either the “hull integrity” is reduced to 0, causing the mech to explode, or enough aliens escape to the surface of the planet, the game ends.

Code - Swagonite, Evilhamsta, RedSkinnedDevil

Art - Swagonite, I Would Like To Rage

Music & Sound - Evilhamsta
